content: आदेशः {@--1@} An order, command; भ्रातुरादेशमादाय <ls>Rām.</ls>; आदेशं देशकालज्ञः प्रतिजग्राह <ls>R. 1. 92</ls>; राजद्विष्टादेशकृतः <ls>Y. 2. 304</ls> doing acts forbidden by the king. {@--2@} Advice, instruction, precept, rule; आदित्यो ब्रह्मेत्यादेशः <ls>Ch. Up.</ls> {@--3@} Account, information, relation, pointing out, indication. {@--4@} A prediction, prophecy; विप्रश्निकादेशवचनानि <ls>K. 64</ls>; see सिद्धादेश also. {@--5@} (Gram.) A substitute; धातोः स्थान इवादेशं सुग्रीवं संन्यवेशयत् <ls>R. 12. 58.</ls> {@--6@} (In astrology) Event, result, consequence of the conjunction of stars.
